oracle.xml.xsql

Interface XSQLErrorHandler


  •  
    public interface XSQLErrorHandler
    Any custom XSQL Error Handler must implement this interface in order to perform custom processing when an XSQL page processing engine fatal error occurs.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void handleError(XSQLError err, XSQLPageRequest env)
      Handle the fatal error.

    • Method Detail

      • handleError

        void handleError(XSQLError err,
                 XSQLPageRequest env)
        Handle the fatal error.
